frontmatter.title: OpenShift Commons Gathering at Red Hat Summit 2023
frontmatter.price: Included in your Red Hat Summit Registration
frontmatter.registration_text: Register through the Red Hat Summit Portal
frontmatter.lead_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering is on May 6 on Mountain Standard Time (EST)
frontmatter.info_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held live in Denver, Colorado. As always, our focus is on creating a space for peer-to-peer interactions. This Gathering will focus on Case Studies from and by End Users with production deployments of OpenShift sharing their use cases, insights into their workloads and lessons learned along the way. Topics covered during this Gathering include hybrid cloud infrastructure, cloud-native development, and new Emerging technology initiatives.
frontmatter.event_footer_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held on Mountain Standard Time (EST). Please note: Attendees are required to register for Red Hat Summit. OpenShift Commons Partner Reception is open to all registered OpenShift Commons Gathering attendees and starts at 5:00 p.m. Red Hat Summit Reception follows the OpenShift Commons Partner Reception.

schedule.session_name: Welcome to the Commons: Collaboration in Action
AMA with OpenShift Product Managers and Engineers
Closing and Opinionated Guide to Red Hat Summit
